Description: On I-64 at mile marker 258.7 in the City of Newport News, near J Clyde Morris Boulevard, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The west exit 258A narrows.

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 135.1 in the County of Stafford, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The north right shoulder is closed.

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 53.5 in the City of Colonial Heights, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. The north center lane, right lane, and right shoulder are closed.
